name: Neptune
description: On April 14, 2022, Ukraine inflicted Russia's biggest military defeat at sea in the 21st century. The Ukrainian military launched the warship "Moskva" with two Neptune anti-ship missiles. The first Squadron battleship "Petropavlovsk" sank after blowing up a mine while leaving Port Arthur harbor on March 31, 1904. Large flagships are not just a military unit in the fleet. They have a powerful national and national symbolic meaning. They clearly represent the strength and power of the country at sea. Accordingly, their loss is very painful. Visit UkraineFreedom.Art for more details.
